system.description:
At 10th level, you can siphon away divine power intended for the gods’ chosen. At the end of each long rest, you gain a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.s4iiatrup3e3virw]{Channel Divinity} feature. This feature must be from a cleric archetype and granted to clerics of 2nd level. Alternatively, you can instead gain @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.zhuf06durl8bnmh3]{Turn Undead} with the benefit of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.dtjtka3c3t73pycs]{Command Undead} empowerment.

Once you have used the chosen cleric feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.
